name: Well-Used Camera Drone
description:
A well-used camera drone initially recovered from the wreckage of a keepstar in R-AG7W. The ID on the drone shows its owner was part of an independent news team labelled as “Warlock Industries”. 

The drone was scorched while taking an extreme close-up of the explosive force from the Keepstar reactor going critical. 

It is no longer functional, serving as a reminder that empires rise and fall, but news coverage is eternal.
